resources.string: Select a preferred region. This is used to filter out videos in the \"Featured\" videos category.
Experimental: Select one or more preferred languages. This is used to filter out videos in the \"Most Popular\" video category and for video searches.
Backup your subscriptions and bookmarks databases.
Import your subscriptions and bookmarks databases backup.
The subscription and bookmark databases will be replaced with the data in the selected backup file.\n\nContinue?
Databases imported. Restart the app to apply changes.
Import your subscriptions from your YouTube account.
Select YouTube XML file to import

Default tab to show when SkyTube launches: %s
How often to check for new videos from subscribed channels: %s
Comments and video description icons and the navigation bar shall always be displayed
Enter your own YouTube Data API Key. Leave blank to use the default one.
An error occurred attempting to validate the API Key you entered.
Key is valid. Restart app to use the new YouTube API key.
Restart app to switch back to default YouTube API key.
Select this to enable downloading videos on mobile networks. Otherwise, videos can only be downloaded on Wi-Fi.
